events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position.
The candidate's application was reviewed and categorized under the engineering department promptly after submission.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires was assigned to manage the candidate's application and coordinate the next steps.
The candidate successfully passed the initial screening call where basic software engineering skills and experience were assessed.
The candidate responded promptly and enthusiastically to the interview invitation, confirming availability for the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to assess their engineering competencies in detail.
The candidate completed a rigorous technical interview that demonstrated strong problem-solving and coding skills.
Following successful technical rounds, an HR interview was scheduled to discuss culture fit and compensation expectations.
The HR interview was completed with a positive discussion about the candidate's background and motivation for joining us.
A competitive offer was proposed to the candidate including details on salary, benefits, and starting date.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and asked a few clarifying questions about the role.
We received confirmation that the candidate has accepted the offer to join our engineering team.
The candidate has started the onboarding process and is being introduced to the engineering teams and tools.
The hiring process is now officially closed with the successful onboarding of the new software engineer.
